```{r setup}
library(dplyr)
library(deepSentimentR)

data("sentiment140_train")

sentiment140_train %>% 
  freq_by_polarity(user_list = c("", "mcraddictal"), 
                   start_date_time = lubridate::as_datetime("2009-05-30"),
                   end_date_time = lubridate::as_datetime("2009-06-03"),
                   keyword_list = c(""))
```
